attributes.review: i downloaded this app hoping to find a reason to vote for trump but wasn’t very helpful.the app is way to hard to navigate and was very laggy to the point of it closing the app a few times.
attributes.title: Was so confusing

attributes.review:
“So I downloaded this app to vote for our president, Donald J. Trump (J for “The New Jesus”) and I was keeping up with all of the news right? We really should get rid of Tik Tok. All of these reviews are so immature too. Like, turning into Trump. They probably lost all of their Christianity from writing their reviews. Anyways, I was reading all of the things that Trump would do through the next four years because EVERYONE should DEFINITELY vote for him. But suddenly, I thought I heard something coming from downstairs. But as soon as it started, it had stopped. I thought it was just me so I went back to looking at the news. The next day I went to school NOT wearing mask because who cares about listening to whatever professional doctors who’ve had almost a decade of professional learning to help people when stuff like this happens. Absolutely no one. It’s ridiculous. One of my close friends got on live television and she said that she wouldn’t wear a mask because “things gotta breathe!” I’m just so proud of her. YOU GO KAREN!!! Anyways, I was in math class and I was doing just fine, until I felt a tingling feeling behind me. Slowly, I turned around. And I just couldn’t believe it. It was DONALD TRUMP!!! But something felt off. Until it hit me. IT WAS HIS EVIL TWIN MCDONALD S. HUMP!!!(S for “The New Satan) And he had horrendous corn silk hair. I prefer Trump’s luxurious hair. Suddenly, he possessed me and the worst  thing happened. He made me get my fat, juicy ass omg my chair and got me to go up to the whiteboard. He made me get glue and glitter and made me draw a PENIS WITH GLUE AND PUT GLITTER ALL OVER IT!!! My teacher came came into the room and she tried to wipe it off, but it was already dry. My whole class got detention. And it is still there to this day.”

“And that is what happened at school today, step bro. Anyways, I’m going to go do the laundry.” I say.

“Don’t get stuck!” He says with a mischievous grin.

I got stuck.
The End
attributes.title: I’m honestly disgusted. (Read the whole thing)

attributes.review: this app is not very good.i got because I saw a tik tok about it saying that is was rlly good.so I downloaded and it started to glitch me out of the app and then it started to work for literally 2 seconds before glitching everything inside the app.😱please remove this app it is not what it seems like.i have seen many other compliments about this app too.this app is false information.it is not good at all.-Michele Obama😘

It took a month to download on my phone.When it finally downloaded on my phone.The app was very laggy and didn’t work half of the time.All the app showed me was pictures of Donald Trump.The app had a link to the dark web.The link was very inappropriate it told me a lot of secrets about the government.Everybody the illuminati is real the government is hiding a lot of secrets from us. If you download this app beware you will be scarred for life.Oh awesome by the way do not delete TikTok.love you 😘

attributes.review: I downloaded this app to see why I should vote for trump. But instead this app took forever to download it took 3 hours. Then this orange face creature said you better vote for me or you will die !! I ALMOST HAD A HEART ATTACK!! Because this scared me so bad. I would not recommend this app if you have heart problems or even if you don’t have heart problems. Also this app is very racist.BAD ORANGE MAN ✨🍊✨.
